commands.name: az dns-resolver policy dns-security-rule create
commands.summary: Create a DNS security rule for a DNS resolver policy.
commands.syntax:
az dns-resolver policy dns-security-rule create --action
                                                --dns-security-rule-name
                                                --domain-lists
                                                --policy-name
                                                --priority
                                                --resource-group
                                                [--if-match]
                                                [--if-none-match]
                                                [--location]
                                                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                [--rule-state {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                                [--tags]
examples: az dns-resolver policy dns-security-rule create --resource-group sampleResourceGroup --policy-name sampleDnsResolverPolicy --dns-security-rule-name sampleDnsSecurityRule --location westus2 --tags "{key1:value1}" --priority 100 --action "{action-type:Block,block-response-code:SERVFAIL}" --domain-lists "[{id:/subscriptions/abdd4249-9f34-4cc6-8e42-c2e32110603e/resourceGroups/sampleResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Network/dnsResolverDomainLists/sampleDnsResolverDomainList}]" --rule-state Enabled

commands.name: az dns-resolver policy dns-security-rule delete
commands.summary: Delete a DNS security rule for a DNS resolver policy. WARNING: This operation cannot be undone.
commands.syntax:
az dns-resolver policy dns-security-rule delete [--dns-security-rule-name]
                                                [--ids]
                                                [--if-match]
                                                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                [--policy-name]
                                                [--resource-group]
                                                [--subscription]
                                                [--yes]
examples: az dns-resolver policy dns-security-rule delete --resource-group sampleResourceGroup --policy-name sampleDnsDnsResolverPolicy --dns-security-rule-name sampleDnsSecurityRule

commands.name: az dns-resolver policy dns-security-rule list
commands.summary: List DNS security rules for a DNS resolver policy.
examples: az dns-resolver policy dns-security-rule list --resource-group sampleResourceGroup --policy-name sampleDnsResolverPolicy

commands.name: az dns-resolver policy dns-security-rule show
commands.summary: Get properties of a DNS security rule for a DNS resolver policy.
examples: az dns-resolver policy dns-security-rule show --resource-group sampleResourceGroup --policy-name sampleDnsResolverPolicy --dns-security-rule-name sampleDnsSecurityRule

commands.name: az dns-resolver policy dns-security-rule update
commands.summary: Update a DNS security rule for a DNS resolver policy.
commands.syntax:
az dns-resolver policy dns-security-rule update [--action]
                                                [--add]
                                                [--dns-security-rule-name]
                                                [--domain-lists]
                                                [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                [--ids]
                                                [--if-match]
                                                [--if-none-match]
                                                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                [--policy-name]
                                                [--priority]
                                                [--remove]
                                                [--resource-group]
                                                [--rule-state {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                                [--set]
                                                [--subscription]
                                                [--tags]
examples: az dns-resolver policy dns-security-rule update --resource-group sampleResourceGroup --policy-name sampleDnsResolverPolicy --rule-name sampleDnsSecurityRule --location westus2 --tags "{key2:value2}" --priority 100 --action "{action-type:Block,block-response-code:SERVFAIL}" --domain-lists "[{id:/subscriptions/abdd4249-9f34-4cc6-8e42-c2e32110603e/resourceGroups/sampleResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Network/dnsResolverDomainLists/sampleDnsResolverDomainList}]" --rule-state Disabled

commands.name: az dns-resolver policy dns-security-rule wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
